name: CHEST FORMATION INTERGRATED SHIELD

actions.name: SHIELD ACTIVE
actions.trigger: You are reduced to half or les than half HP
actions.detail: 1/structure, after taking dmage and when you have half or less than half hp, your mech may gain Overshield 7 and has resistance to heat from hostile characters for as long as it has Overshield

description: <i>SHAKA's Chest formation is a standard among frontline assault patterns. Intended for use in alpha strike encounters many Impi favor the Chest formation for its ability to wage and maintain single pattern wars of attrition.<i>

name: LEFT HORN FORMATION ENHANCED COMBAT SYSTEM
effect: Gain the Left Horn's Gore reaction
description: <i>The Left Horn formation is only assumed by the bravest of the Impi, they are agile and deadly and when linked with superior combat systems, Left Horns are able to pierce the ranks of enemy formations with deadly force.<i>

actions.name: LEFT HORN'S GORE
actions.trigger: An enemy takes an action while in line of sight.
actions.detail: 1/round, as part of this reaction you may skirmish a hostile character dealing half damage or burn and ignoring all forms of damage reduction from the triggering character.

name: RIGHT HORN FORMATION TACTICAL REACTOR CLOAK
effect: Your mech gains Invisible and soft cover while Exposed
description: <i>The Right Horn formation practices the tested tactics of SHAKAâ€™s HIDE/STRIKE combat doctrines. Left Horns employ paracausal adjacent technology to create localized ruptures in the firmament rendering them invisible when approaching enemy flanks.<i>

name: LOINS FORMATION OVERLIMITER RELEASE
effect: 1/scene, you may Brace without sacrificing any actions or movement on your following turn. You may choose to use this effect 2/scene but upon the second use and after damage is resolved your mech becomes permanently Exposed and Slowed until the end of the scene. These effects cannot be cleared by any other means.
description: <i>Loins formation combat patterns reserve the right to see the battle won. Typically upgraded with Mfecane proprietary predictive combat systems Impi of the Loins act with the will of SHAKA forming the soul of the charging bull.
